Description: For sale is one very well traveled pair of Oakley Juliet sunglasses. I have had this pair of glasses for almost a decade and I used them during sporting activities, and they saw some abuse because of it. They have been repaired by Oakley once already and have had the lenses changed several times. The current condition is very used, but I think repairable for the right person. The biggest issue currently is that the nose “gasket” needs to be replaced. It is extremely loose and makes the glasses hard to wear. There are videos online on how to do this or I have previously sent them to Oakley(not sure if you can still do this). Aside from the nose, the lenses will need to be replaced to whatever color you prefer. You may want to replace the rubber pieces on the glasses but that’s a personal preference. The frame is a matte charcoal color. I’m selling them as is. They were great to me and I am hoping they find another person who appreciates them or can use the parts to repair a pair they already own. I only charge actual shipping...if ebay overcharges I return the difference.

Title: Oakley X-Metal Juliet Sunglasses, Pre-owned
